segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and water is pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem to notice her foot is in a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the stool creaking under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting with her hand out, like she’s part of the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get caught before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt with all this water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
